name: Taran Disruptive
description:
Introducing the major players within the ranks of Generatives and Disruptives at Gormenghast.

Taran Disruptive – the war-dog of the brutalist Phare Disruptive.

Aside from being one of the four known dogs from hell, she also displays cat-like behavioural tropes in that she will toy with her victims for many hours, teasing and torturing, until she gets bored.

And then she’ll keep them alive for a while until she’s ready to begin again.

It drives the victim mad.

PNG 4800 x 4800 || December 13th 2021 || Dark Art digital painting – expanding the Gormenghast origin universe
